description: An account of the rehabilitation at the Wilwyck School for Boys in the State of New York of an emotionally disturbed Negro boy who, abandoned by his parents, feels unwanted, misunderstood and inwardly tortured. Commentary and dialogue written by James Agee. Narrated by Gary Merrill.
